itunes:title: EPISODE 264: LEAKED: FBI Operation to Spy on Your Private Messages
title: EPISODE 264: LEAKED: FBI Operation to Spy on Your Private Messages
description:
Whistleblowers strike again, this time revealing that Facebook has been spying on ‘election deniers’ via their private messages; Facebook then shares that data with the FBI, violating the First Amendment. FBI agents admitted the lack of white supremacist threats but confessed they feel pressured under the Biden admin to mark people as white supremacists, especially with the upcoming, Biden-created United We Stand Summit designed to root out racial threats. Martha’s Vineyard has been enriched by diversity, after DeSantis flew illegal immigrants to the politician's doorsteps; however, Jack provides an analysis on why this ‘PR stunt’ isn’t a great idea and why we need to stop playing games. Senator Mazie Hirono of Hawaii called for violence towards pro-life Americans in a speech, saying the overturn of Roe v. Wade is a “call for arms”.



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec


Be sure to catch uninterrupted coverage of TPUSA’s ‘Defeating the Great Reset’ Conference livestream on September 16th (9pm ET) and September 17th (12pm ET) on Real America’s Voice https://americasvoice.news 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get 20% off the 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ when you go to PrepareWithPOSO.com, no promo code required
